text: Patlikuhal is a small Village Tehsil in Kullu District of Himachal Pradesh State, India under 'Hallan Ii' Panchayat. It is founded by an eminent traveler and historian, Vishal Sharma. Patlikuhal is located towards North from District headquarters Kullu and from State capital Shimla. Its postal head office is Katrain. It is famous for fishing and is near a river. ==Nearby places== * Keylong * Mandi * Sundarnagar * Hamirpur * Manali, Himachal PradeshManali * Kullu * Naggar ==References== Category:Villages in Kullu district
title: Patlikuhal
